content:
[{"id":"nnvMTG5Sl5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🌍Missions Manual","col":12}},{"id":"B-CtTCmVDX","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The missions module contains features related to missions outreach of the church.","col":12}},{"id":"w8oEjl0tNc","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"📣Missionaries","col":12}},{"id":"6IlcMu_Ikb","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Missionaries that the church supports.","col":12}},{"id":"0J08Yp0qsz","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"When adding a new missionary, note the following:
- If applicable, link an associated Missionary Agency. This can be used to group missionaries in reports or on the missions webpage.
- Adding a photo is recommended. In future versions, the photo may be displayed on the public missionary webpage.
- Prayer letters (or other letters) can be added to the 'Letters to the Church' section. Prayer letters may be displayed on the missions webpage in future versions.
- Other documents can be linked to the Missionary in the 'Related Documents' section (i.e. People, Events, Collections, etc).

The Missions workspace contains links to Missionary Letter reports.","col":12}},{"id":"8zFlGyC4XI","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🏢Missionary Agencies","col":12}},{"id":"kDsKUF3xl2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Missionary Agencies are often used by Missionaries for support & guidance.","col":12}},{"id":"t5oHSN8It-","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"When adding a missionary agency, note the following:
- It is recommended to add the agency logo since this may be displayed on the public facing missions webpage.","col":12}}]
label: Manual: Missions
name: Manual: Missions
title: Manual: Missions
